name: SuccessNOW.ai AI Business Services

item.description: Industry-specific AI solutions including RealtorNOW for real estate lead qualification and AutoDealersNOW for automotive sales automation with voice-enabled AI agents.

item.name: AI Tools for Client Retention
item.description: Advanced AI systems that review client history, provide personalized support, and proactively follow up for renewals and upsells to maximize customer lifetime value.

item.name: AI Onboarding for Small Business
item.description: Complete AI implementation service where our AI Onboarding Agent collects business info, AI WebDev Agent builds websites, and AI CRM Setup tracks every lead automatically. Includes 4 x 1 hour expert onboarding sessions.

item.description: Earn 25% recurring commissions on all referrals with our simplified flat-rate affiliate program. No tiers, just consistent 25% on every sale.

offers.description: 25% recurring commission on all referred clients

item.description: Premium agency partnership program offering 40% recurring commissions for agencies reselling our AI solutions. Complete white-label support and done-for-you setup included.

item.name: Healthcare AI Solutions
